doc.field: The White House said President Reagan would make an announcement at 1530 EST/2030 gmt but the topic was undisclosed. A spokesman said officials would brief reporters on details of the announcement afterwards. Athough Reagan's topic was not disclosed, speculation centered on the possible naming of a nominee to to head the CIA or a response to the Soviet Union's offer to negotiate a separate arms control agreement on medium range missiles in Europe. Reuter
